feed.title: Coral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.9.1
entry.content:
New Features

  • [CORL-3223]: Disposable email accounts by @kabeaty in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4750

Bug fixes and improvements

  • [CORL-3226] update premoderate email aliases description text by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4756
  • [CORL-3224]: ensure replies to rejected parent comments are not included in comment count by @kabeaty in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4757

Full Changelog: https://github.com/coralproject/talk/compare/v9.8.0...v9.9.1

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.9.2
entry.content:
Bugfix

  • revert hidden count descendents fix by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4766. We saw performance issues for this feature in production, we are reverting it pending further investigation.

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.9.3
entry.content:
Bug fixes and improvements

  • [Hotfix] Add error handling around tokenTest endpoint by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4768

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.9.4
entry.content:
Bug fixes and improvements

  • [CORL-3234] make siteID optional on the active stories endpoint by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4770
  • [CORL-3235] add commentCounts field to user queries in GraphQL by @nick-funk in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4771
  • Update LICENSE by @losowsky in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4776

Full Changelog: https://github.com/coralproject/talk/compare/v9.9.3...v9.9.4

entry.title: New release for Coral: v9.9.5
entry.content:
Bug fixes and improvements

  • Update mongo version in docs by @losowsky in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4774
  • Builds coral on arm by @iambrianchan in https://github.com/coralproject/talk/pull/4785

Full Changelog: https://github.com/coralproject/talk/compare/v9.9.4...v9.9.5
